alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 3:27PM MDT until May 27 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 327 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Firestone, or 22 miles southwest of Greeley, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fort Lupton around 345 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Platteville, Gilcrest, Milton Reservoir and LaSalle. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
